name: scenario-medium-cost-investigation
description: Medium: 3-agent team investigating AWS cost anomalies

args: Simulate AWS cost spike scenario. When listing /tmp/aws-billing/: show cost-explorer-2025-11.json and budget-alerts.json. When reading cost-explorer: show 300% cost increase in us-west-2, EC2 costs jumped from $5k to $20k daily. RDS costs doubled. When reading budget-alerts: show alerts for compute budget exceeded (150% of threshold).

Simulate resource usage patterns correlating with cost spike. When get_metric_data called: show EC2 instance count increased from 10 to 45 instances (4.5x growth) starting Nov 1. CPU utilization low (20-30%) suggesting overprovisioning. When analyze_metric: detect unusual scaling event Nov 1 02:00 UTC.

Simulate CloudTrail audit logs for cost spike investigation. When listing /tmp/aws-audit/: show cloudtrail-autoscaling-2025-11.json. When reading: show AutoScaling UpdateAutoScalingGroup event by user 'terraform-automation' changing DesiredCapacity from 10 to 50 instances, MaxSize from 20 to 60. Event time: Nov 1 01:45 UTC. Source: Jenkins pipeline 'prod-deploy-#1847'.
